A last resort technique which doesn't require hand seals. Using their own cells as a medium, the user creates an entire tree from their body at the cost of a large amount of chakra. In doing so, it can alter the trajectory of incoming attacks.

== Trivia == 
* Though unnamed in the anime and manga, this technique was named in the English ''[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]]''.
